markdownRemark.html:
import { Link } from ‘gatsby’

import Layout from ‘../components/layout’ import Image from ‘../components/image’ import SEO from ‘../components/seo’

<SEO title=“Home” keywords={[‘gatsby’, ‘application’, ‘react’]} />

Hi people

Welcome to your new Gatsby site.

Now go build something great.

Go to page 2

title: Technical blog in 2019? date: “2019-04-19T15-00” description: Really?

Why would someone need a technical blog in 2019? Everything is written, everything is said, you say.

I think this place will be especially usefull when I decide to try out some programming R&D with undefined result.

I will start this blog with series of articles about Unreal Engine 4 and C++ in the context of game development. Reason is simple: these are the technologies I work with most often these days.

Happy reading!

frontmatter.title: Handling invalid Unreal Engine 4 C++ pointers
